00041 
00042 #define BMP_HEADER_MARKER   ((unsigned short) ('M' << 8) | 'B')
00043 
00044 #pragma pack(push)
00045 #pragma pack(2)
00046 typedef struct __BMP_FILEHEADER
00047 {
00048         unsigned short bfType;
00049         unsigned long  bfSize;
00050         unsigned short bfReserved1;
00051         unsigned short bfReserved2;
00052         unsigned long  bfOffBits;
00053     
00054 } BMP_FILEHEADER;
00055 
00056 typedef struct __BMP_INFOHEADER
00057 {
00058         unsigned long  biSize;
00059         long           biWidth;
00060         long           biHeight;
00061         unsigned short biPlanes;
00062         unsigned short biBitCount;
00063         unsigned long  biCompression;
00064         unsigned long  biSizeImage;
00065         long           biXPelsPerMeter;
00066         long           biYPelsPerMeter;
00067         unsigned long  biClrUsed;
00068         unsigned long  biClrImportant;
00069     
00070 } BMP_INFOHEADER;
00071 
00072 typedef struct __BMP_RGBQUAD
00073 {
00074     unsigned char rgbBlue;
00075     unsigned char rgbGreen;
00076     unsigned char rgbRed;
00077     unsigned char rgbReserved;
00078     
00079 } BMP_RGBQUAD;
00080 
00081 typedef struct __BMP_INFO
00082 {
00083     BMP_INFOHEADER bmiHeader;
00084     BMP_RGBQUAD    bmiColors[1];
00085     
00086 } BMP_INFO;
00087 #pragma pack(pop)
00088 
00089 
00090 bool lbann::image_utils::loadBMP(const char* Imagefile, int& Width, int& Height, int& BPP, bool Flip, unsigned char*& Pixels)
00091 {
00092     FILE *infile = fopen(Imagefile, "rb");
00093     if (infile == NULL) {
00094         fprintf(stderr, "can't open %s\n", Imagefile);
00095         return false;
00096         }
00097     
00098         // Read Bitmap File Header
00099     BMP_FILEHEADER header;
00100     fread(&header, sizeof(BMP_FILEHEADER), 1, infile);
00101         if (header.bfType != BMP_HEADER_MARKER) {
00102                 fclose(infile);
00103         return false;
00104         }
00105     
00106         // Read Bitmap Info
00107     int bisize = header.bfOffBits - sizeof(BMP_FILEHEADER);
00108     BMP_INFO* info = (BMP_INFO*)malloc(bisize);
00109         fread(info, bisize, 1, infile);
00110     
00111         // Check Palette Count
00112         if (info->bmiHeader.biClrUsed != 0 || info->bmiHeader.biBitCount != 24) {
00113                 free(info);
00114                 fclose(infile);
00115         return false;
00116         }
00117     
00118         // Read DIB Bits
00119     int bitrowsize = ((info->bmiHeader.biWidth * info->bmiHeader.biBitCount + 31) / 32) * 4;
00120     int bitsize = bitrowsize * info->bmiHeader.biHeight;
00121     unsigned char* bits = (unsigned char*)malloc(bitsize);
00122         fread(bits, bitsize, 1, infile);
00123     
00124         // Set Pixels
00125     Width = info->bmiHeader.biWidth;
00126     Height = info->bmiHeader.biHeight;
00127     BPP = 3;
00128     Pixels = new unsigned char[Width * Height * BPP];
00129     for (int y = 0; y < Height; y++) {
00130         for (int x = 0; x < Width; x++) {
00131             int offset = (Flip) ? ((Height - 1 - y) * Width + x) : (y * Width + x);
00132             Pixels[offset * 3 + 0] = bits[y * bitrowsize + x * 3 + 2];
00133             Pixels[offset * 3 + 1] = bits[y * bitrowsize + x * 3 + 1];
00134             Pixels[offset * 3 + 2] = bits[y * bitrowsize + x * 3 + 0];
00135                 }
00136         }
00137     
00138         free(info);
00139         free(bits);
00140         fclose(infile);
00141 
00142     return true;
00143 }
00144 
00145 bool lbann::image_utils::saveBMP(const char* Imagefile, int Width, int Height, int BPP, bool Flip, unsigned char* Pixels)
00146 {
00147     if (BPP != 3)
00148         return false;
00149 
00150 
00151 
00152     return false;
00153 }

00155 bool lbann::image_utils::loadPGM(const char* Imagefile, int& Width, int& Height, int& BPP, bool Flip, unsigned char*& Pixels)
00156 {
00157     FILE *infile = fopen(Imagefile, "rb");
00158     if (infile == NULL) {
00159         fprintf(stderr, "can't open %s\n", Imagefile);
00160         return false;
00161     }
00162 
00163     char format[5];
00164     fscanf(infile, "%s", format);
00165     int width, height;
00166     fscanf(infile, "%d%d", &width, &height);
00167     int maxpixel;
00168     fscanf(infile, "%d", &maxpixel);
00169 
00170     Width = width;
00171     Height = height;
00172     BPP = 1;
00173     Pixels = new unsigned char[Width * Height * BPP];
00174 
00175     for (int y = 0; y < Height; y++) {
00176         for (int x = 0; x < Width; x++) {
00177             int offset = (Flip) ? ((Height - 1 - y) * Width + x) : (y * Width + x);
00178             int pixel = fgetc(infile);
00179             Pixels[offset] = (unsigned char)((double)pixel / maxpixel * 255.0);
00180         }
00181     }
00182 
00183     fclose(infile);
00184     return true;
00185 }
00186 
00187 bool lbann::image_utils::savePGM(const char* Imagefile, int Width, int Height, int BPP, bool Flip, unsigned char* Pixels)
00188 {
00189     if (BPP != 1)
00190         return false;
00191 
00192     FILE* outfile = fopen(Imagefile, "wb");
00193     if (outfile == NULL) {
00194         fprintf(stderr, "can't create %s\n", Imagefile);
00195         return false;
00196     }
00197 
00198     fprintf(outfile, "P5\n");
00199     fprintf(outfile, "%d %d\n", Width, Height);
00200     fprintf(outfile, "255\n");
00201 
00202     for (int y = 0; y < Height; y++) {
00203         for (int x = 0; x < Width; x++) {
00204             int offset = (Flip) ? ((Height - 1 - y) * Width + x) : (y * Width + x);
00205             fputc(Pixels[offset], outfile);
00206         }
00207     }
00208 
00209     fclose(outfile);
00210     return true;
00211 }
00212 
00213 bool lbann::image_utils::loadPNG(const char* Imagefile, int& Width, int& Height, bool Flip, uchar*& Pixels)
00214 {
00215 #ifdef __LIB_OPENCV
00216     Mat image = imread(Imagefile, CV_LOAD_IMAGE_COLOR);
00217     if (image.empty())
00218         return false;
00219 
00220     Width = image.cols;
00221     Height = image.rows;
00222 
00223     for (int y = 0; y < Height; y++) {
00224         for (int x = 0; x < Width; x++) {
00225             Vec3b pixel = image.at<Vec3b>(y, x);
00226 
00227             int offset = (Flip) ? ((Height - 1 - y) * Width + x) : (y * Width + x);
00228             Pixels[offset * 3 + 0] = pixel[0];
00229             Pixels[offset * 3 + 1] = pixel[1];
00230             Pixels[offset * 3 + 2] = pixel[2];
00231         }
00232     }
00233 
00234     return true;
00235 #else
00236     return false;
00237 #endif
00238 }
00239 
00240 bool lbann::image_utils::savePNG(const char* Imagefile, int Width, int Height, bool Flip, uchar* Pixels)
00241 {
00242 #ifdef __LIB_OPENCV
00243     Mat image = Mat(Height, Width, CV_8UC3);
00244 
00245     for (int y = 0; y < Height; y++) {
00246         for (int x = 0; x < Width; x++) {
00247             Vec3b pixel;
00248 
00249             int offset = (Flip) ? ((Height - 1 - y) * Width + x) : (y * Width + x);
00250             pixel[0] = Pixels[offset * 3 + 0];
00251             pixel[1] = Pixels[offset * 3 + 1];
00252             pixel[2] = Pixels[offset * 3 + 2];
00253 
00254             image.at<Vec3b>(y, x) = pixel;
00255         }
00256     }
00257     imwrite(Imagefile, image);
00258 
00259     return true;
00260 #else
00261     return false;
00262 #endif
00263 }
00264 
00265 bool lbann::image_utils::loadJPG(const char* Imagefile, int& Width, int& Height, bool Flip, unsigned char*& Pixels)
00266 {
00267 #ifdef __LIB_OPENCV
00268     Mat image = imread(Imagefile, CV_LOAD_IMAGE_COLOR);
00269     if (image.empty())
00270         return false;
00271 
00272     Width = image.cols;
00273     Height = image.rows;
00274 
00275     for (int y = 0; y < Height; y++) {
00276         for (int x = 0; x < Width; x++) {
00277             Vec3b pixel = image.at<Vec3b>(y, x);
00278 
00279             int offset = (Flip) ? ((Height - 1 - y) * Width + x) : (y * Width + x);
00280             Pixels[offset * 3 + 0] = pixel[0];
00281             Pixels[offset * 3 + 1] = pixel[1];
00282             Pixels[offset * 3 + 2] = pixel[2];
00283         }
00284     }
00285 
00286     return true;
00287 #else
00288     return false;
00289 #endif
00290 }

00292 bool lbann::image_utils::saveJPG(const char* Imagefile, int Width, int Height, bool Flip, unsigned char* Pixels)
00293 {
00294 #ifdef __LIB_OPENCV
00295     Mat image = Mat(Height, Width, CV_8UC3);
00296 
00297     for (int y = 0; y < Height; y++) {
00298         for (int x = 0; x < Width; x++) {
00299             Vec3b pixel;
00300 
00301             int offset = (Flip) ? ((Height - 1 - y) * Width + x) : (y * Width + x);
00302             pixel[0] = Pixels[offset * 3 + 0];
00303             pixel[1] = Pixels[offset * 3 + 1];
00304             pixel[2] = Pixels[offset * 3 + 2];
00305 
00306             image.at<Vec3b>(y, x) = pixel;
00307         }
00308     }
00309     imwrite(Imagefile, image);
00310 
00311     return true;
00312 #else
00313     return false;
00314 #endif
00315 }
